channel.title: Needing Commands
channel.description:
Ok i am needing a list of command codes e.g.
::commands ::master ::god
More commands will be added if needed. - Dippy - Help me and you will be on my server :D

item.title: Needing Commands
item.dc:creator: @king_enjoi king enjoi
item.description:
@king_enjoi wrote:

try this for ::god

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy...", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy..", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic

item.title: Needing Commands
item.dc:creator: @toonshorty toonshorty
item.description:
@toonshorty wrote:

for ::master

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSummonXP(886000000);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs).”);
}[/code

for ::god

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy...", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"Energy..", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }[/code]
